title: White Palace (1990) Susan Sarandon (Dual ENG-FRA,MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103251/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103251/</a>

Optional Swedish subtitles in separate idx/sub files included in this torrent.

Additional Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish and German subs uploaded in new torrent:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4397331

With James Spader (then 30, from Stargate 1994) 
and Jason Alexander (then 31, from Seinfeld).

Good story about a young, rich man who falls in love with a mature working woman. A full DVD has survived here at PirateBay since June, 2005, so I made this rip for those of you who cannot handle such downloads. I would have thought this film too special for you guys here, but perhaps it's the hot sex with an experienced woman that keeps up the interest.

Thanks to user 'abraksta' for uploading the DVD, which contains several audio tracks in stereo and lots of subtitles. It still has seeders at http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3349403/White_Palace
I kept the French soundtrack.

XviD 2-pass Widescreen 704x384, good stereo AC3 on both soundtracks: Original English (track 1) and French (track 2). Or download the better VLC player for free (plays almost anything, including iso) from http://www.videolan.org/vlc/

English track plays normal in WMP. To hear French, open in DivX Player or some other, right-click and choose track 2.

Burn tested, runs well in both my DivX players. Choose audio track with remote as for DVD.
